generic.note: Force Staff and similar abilities can no longer be used on Leashed targets (Slark Pounce, Puck Dream Coil, Time Zone, etc.)
Fixed a crash related to Lich's Chain Frost
Fixed a crash related to Lycan's Shapeshift
Fixed a crash related to Mars Arena of Blood
Fixed a crash related to Morphling's Replicate
Fixed a crash related to Silencer's Glaive of Wisdom
Fixed a crash related to Venomancer's Plague Ward
Fixed Light Collector incorrectly having a 25% penalty instead of 75%
Fixed Quelling Blade using flipped damage values for Melee/Ranged
Fixed Blademail reflecting Witch Doctor's Scepter Death Ward bounce damage back to him
Fixed Yasha and Kaya Cast Speed stacking
Fixed Skadi slow values being inverted for Ranged vs Melee.
Fixed Disperser applying 2 dispels if cast on self.
Fixed Radiance not updating dynamically with changes to AoE Bonus
Fixed Shiva's Guard not updating dynamically with changes to AoE Bonus
Fixed Gris-Gris tooltip
Fixed Axe Shard granting no Counter Helix Cooldown instead of the Scepter
Fixed Axe One man Army losing HP when dispelled continuously
Fixed Abaddon's Curse of Avernus not giving the attack speed bonus to allies.
Fixed Ancient Apparation's Chilling Touch not increasing in strength as it was leveled up
Fixed Batrider's Sticky Napalm first application damage incorrectly applying Napalm damage.
Fixed Clinkz's Burning Barrage not auto-applying Tar Bomb
Fixed Clinkz Skeleton Archers also applying Burning Barrage when cast
Fixed Dawnbreaker Gleaming Hammer Effects
Fixed Dragon's Knight's Corrosive Dragon not applying Wyrm's Wrath to buildings while in Elder Dragon Form
Fixed Faceless Void's Distortion Field having some undesirable interactions
Fixed Huskar not being able to attack ethereal targets with Revenant's Brooch
Fixed Invoker's Mastermind not working properly
Fixed Invoker spell lifesteal effects showing erroneously
Fixed Leshrac Level 15 Talent not stacking its movement speed correctly with Yasha based items.
Fixed Lich not being able to cast Frost Shield during Sinister Gaze
Fixed Lion not being granted Finger of Death stacks when killing a hero with Cleave
Fixed Lone Druid Unbearable Facet not affecting BAT
Fixed Lone Druid Level 20 and Level 25 Talents not properly applying to the bear
Fixed Lycan Spirit Wolves being able to attack things sometimes.
Fixed Mars getting regen from invisible/fow targets, revealing them.
Fixed Meepo Pack Rat being able to share Moon Shards
Fixed Meepo Pack Rat sometimes not properly setting other Meepos Items on Cooldown properly.
Fixed Meepo's More Meepo making players miss a stat or talent point
Fixed Muerta respawning at her ofrenda when dying with Aegis.
Fixed Muerta Dance of the Dead tooltip inaccuracy.
Fixed Nyx Assassin Burrow not stacking with Aether Lens
Fixed Nyx Assassin Mana Burn working with Spirit Vessel
Fixed Ogre Magi's Learning Curve making players miss a stat or talent point
Fixed Phantom Assassin Level 25 Talent +10% Crit Chance not working properly
Fixed Phantom Assassin's Mark of Death appearing twice

Fixed Phantom Assassin sometimes consuming its mark without casting a critical strike (Note that critical strike is calculated at the beginning of the attack swing so if an attack starts swinging before dagger connect, that attack won't have a critical strike, but the next one will)
Fixed Phantom Assassin Illusions creating and consuming Methodical charges
Fixed Phoenix's abilities sometimes applying one instance of blind less than intended.
Fixed Pudge not gaining health from Fleash Heap stacks immediately
Fixed Puck's Curveball projectile speed sometimes traveling too fast
Fixed Puck Puckish granting Puck Mana and Health whenever any unit disjointed a projectile.
Fixed Shadow Demon's Level 25 Talent 2 Charges of Disruption not working properly
Fixed Silencer's Aghanim's Shard not increasing INT steal properly
Fixed Slark shard Depth Shroud not healing allies
Fixed Sniper cancelling Taunts when Take Aim expired.
Fixed Spirit Breaker's Planar Pocket having some undesirable interactions
Fixed Storm Spirit's Ball Lightning sometimes not costing Mana
Fixed Storm Spirit's Shock Collar kills counting as denies
Fixed Storm Spirit losing Galvanized charges when dying with Aegis of the Immortal
Fixed Templar Assassin's Blink Dagger being muted when blocking damage with Refraction
Fixed Timbersaw's Whirling Death debuff not reducing attributes
Fixed Timbersaw's Chakram effects sometimes not appearing
Fixed Timbersaw's Exposure Therapy not working
Fixed Tiny Grow Toss bonus damage only applying to the tossed target.
Fixed Undying's Ceaseless Dirge triggering when dying from Aegis of the Immortal
Fixed Venomancer's Level 25 Talent 2.5x Plague Ward HP/Damage not working with Plague Attachment
Fixed Venomancer ministunning if Venomous Gale was dispelled without shard.
Fixed Vengeful Spirit Soul Strike with Abyssal blade using Ranged values
Fixed Warlock's Black Grimoire being able to be consumed early
Fixed Warlock Champion of Gorroth burn damage stacking from multiple Hearts of Tarrasque
Fixed Warlock Shadow Word tooltip not properly explaining that it applies its effect on an AoE
Fixed Windranger's Whirldwind getting disabled by Disarm during Debuff Immunity
Fixed Wraith King Spectral Blade's tooltip showing the incorrect damage type.
Gris-gris passive gold now ticks twice as fast in Turbo
Fixed Facets granting abilities when they shouldn't in Ability Draft
Fixed wrong Ability Draft keybinds

ability_notes.note: Base magic resistance decreased from 25% to 20%

talent_notes.note: Level 10 Talent: Movement Speed per Active Battle Hunger reduced from 12% to 10%
Level 10 Talent: Battle Hunger Slow reduced from 12% to 10%

ability_notes.note: Armor Gain per kill reduced from 1 to 0.4/0.6/0.8/1.0
Strength increase reduced from 60% to 50% of Axe's Armor

hero_notes.note: Frozen Expanse Now tied to Freezing Field instead of Arcane Aura
Frozen Expanse Cast Range Bonus rescaled from 50/75/100/125 to 75/100/125
Frozen Expanse AoE Bonus rescaled from 7/8/9/10% to 6/8/10%.
Frozen Expanse AoE bonus now only applies to Crystal Maiden.

talent_notes.note: Level 20 Talent: Blade Dance Lifesteal reduced from +60% to +50%

ability_notes.note: Damage Per Tick decreased from 45/50/55/60 to 40/45/50/55
Agi per stack reduced from 3% to 2%

talent_notes.note: Level 20 Talent Waveform Attacks Target replaced with +50% Waveform Attack Damage and applies On Hit Effects

ability_notes.note: Now attacks all targets it goes through with 50% of Morphling's Attack Damage by default. Does not apply on hit effects

hero_notes.note: Fresh Meat Facet bonus strength per tick reduced from 3/5/7 to 1/3/5
Flayer's Hook Meat Hook distance as damage increased from 10/15/20/25% to 12/18/24/30%
Dust Devil Sand Storm now longer gets destroyed if left by Sand King, and keeps following him if he leaves it.
Base Mana Regen reduced from 0.6 to 0.2
Shock Collar: Enemy Overload duration decreased from 6 to 5s
Base Strength increased by 4

ability_notes.note: Strength to slow resistance reduced from 25% to 20%

hero_notes.note: New Level 25 Talent is applied by Dragon Slave, Light Strike Array, and Laguna Blade. Lasts 3s.

talent_notes.note: Level 25 Talent +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Dragon Slave replaced with +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Spells

hero_notes.note: Translocator: Applies a Strong Dispel to Tinker before Blinking
Translocator: Blink random direction angle reduced from 120 to 90 degrees
Translocator: Blink distance increased from 300 to 350

ability_notes.note: Intelligence per 1% item CDR reduced from 4 to 3

hero_notes.note: Profane Potency Sadist AoE bonus per kill reduced from 50 to 40
Aghanim's Spirit Wraith Duration rescaled from 4/5/6/7 to 4.5/5/5.5/6
Cursed Blade Curse damage reduced from 70% to 50%
Suppress: Silence movement speed slow increased from 10/15/20/25% to 15/20/25/30%

ability_notes.note: Now triggers from hero deaths globally instead of in a 2000 radius

hero_notes.note: Methodical: Stifling Dagger counts as 2 attacks towards Coup de Grace

ability_notes.note: Shield per Instance decreased from 30/40/50/60 to 20/30/40/50
Corrosive Dragon Damage Per Second reduced from 10/15/20/25 to 5/10/15/20
Fire Dragon Cleave increased from 20/30/40/50% to 25/35/45/55%
Now has a 50% mana restoration penalty when attacking creeps.

hero_notes.note: Ironwood Treant Health increased from 550/750/950/1150 to 750/950/1150/1350
Ironwood Treant Max damage increased from 22/34/46/58 to 30/46/62/78

ability_notes.note: Facet magic resist increased from 50% to 60%
Facet status resist increased from 50% to 60%
Bonus Base damage rescaled from 60/80/100/120% to 55/80/105/130%

hero_notes.note: Base armor increased by 1

ability_notes.note: Max attack speed increased from 160/210/260/310 to 170/220/270/320

hero_notes.note: Base health regeneration reduced by 0.5

talent_notes.note: Level 15 Talent +30 Dark Ascension damage reduced to 25

ability_notes.note: No longer works on wards or couriers
Creep health increased from 200+80 per Chen level to 220+80 per Chen level

hero_notes.note: Forsaken: Desolate damage when non-hero units are nearby increased from 40% to 50%

ability_notes.note: Death Rime stacks reduced from 2 to 1

hero_notes.note: Afterburner rocket barrage movement speed only increased by hitting heroes
Base armor reduced by 1
Unbearable: Entangling Claws in Bear Form cooldown reduction increased from -50% to -75%
Unbearable: Entangling Claws in Bear Form chance increased from 20% to 30%
Base Movement Speed reduced from 330 to 320

ability_notes.note: Can now be used on Lone Druid's Spirit Bear

hero_notes.note: Familiars now preserve their stone form alt-cast mode when re-summoned

ability_notes.note: Ability on Visage, can now be casted even if Visage is silenced or stunned (Will not have an effect if Familiars are silenced or stunned)
On self and Familiars have now immediate cast behavior by default. Can be put in alt-cast mode to become point targeted

hero_notes.note: Reverse Reverse Polarity: Effect radius increased from 600 to 700
Reverse Reverse Polarity: Maximum push distance increased from 700 to 850
Reverse Reverse Polarity cooldown decreased from 120 to 100
Mephitic Shroud Aphotic Shield from 180/225/270/315 to 170/210/250/290
Mephitic Shroud Aphotic Shield Damage percent of the absorption amount decreased from 80% to 75%.

ability_notes.note: Aghanim's Scepter trigger damage is reset after mist coil is fired
Movespeed as attack speed from 20% to 30%

hero_notes.note: Stonehall Plate: Damage to Barrier reduced from 100% to 50%
Stonehall Plate: No longer grants Barrier from damaging illusions

ability_notes.note: Aghanim's Shard Radius increase during Duel reduced from 250 to 200
Aghanim's Scepter cooldown reduced from -20s to -10s

hero_notes.note: Health regeneration increased from 0.25 to 1.0
Stepping Stones: Ending Rolling Boulder creates a Stone Remnant in front of Earth Spirit
Stepping Stones: Stone Remnant manacost reduced from 15 to 0
Soul Fragment Conjure Image current HP cost reduced from 20% to 15%

ability_notes.note: Damage per attack range rescaled from 0.4/0.5/0.66/1.0 to 0.25/0.33/0.5/1.0
Bonus Incoming Bonus damage when far away reduced from 75% to 60%

hero_notes.note: Thorny Thicket facet no longer increases spell amp
Double Jump: Maximum Damage increased from 30% to 50%
Double Jump: Maximum Barrier increased from 30% to 50%
Sanctuary Resonant Pulse: Base Barrier reduced from 40/80/120/160 to 30/60/90/120
Base damage increased from 48-54 to 51-57
